head.title: Node.js document merging API | merge PDF, Word, Excel
head.description: Node.js API for merging documents. Merge, split, swap, reorder, and remove pages from PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, XPS, and EPUB files.

header.description: A flexible API for combining, splitting, and editing PDF and Office documents.

actions.title: Ready to get started?
actions.description: Explore GroupDocs.Merger for free or request a license
